ISSUE.TITLE: No data in my tables from a schema
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hello, I am under Microsoft SQL Server and I followed the following tutorial to access my tables which are presented under a schema https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rS0NRwRCjx0&t=30s ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6215266/128686719-11ba53c4-2ba2-4a0f-9a37-6ab27de9d6d8.png) The problem is that once the connection is successful, the application shows me the name of my tables, but without "_" and without data ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6215266/128686482-211d07f6-e248-4fc6-8dcd-ab8e2660eef8.png) Can you please take a look? Thank you
